keys: curso de la vida de los padres
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1061</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Did it Happen in Your Lifetime?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschah er in Ihrer Lebenszeit?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">S'est-il produit dans votre vie ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aconteceu em sua vida?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È accaduto nel vostro corso della vita?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνέβη στη διάρκεια ζωής σας;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Sucedió en su curso de la vida?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Many important historical events happen around the world in a person's lifetime. The learners will be asked to identify the year historical events happened and whether these events happened in their lifetime and or in their parents' lifetime.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">historical events</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parents' lifetime</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viele wichtige historische Fälle geschehen um die Welt in
der Lebenszeit einer Person. Die Anfänger werden gebeten, die 
historischen Fälle des Jahres zu kennzeichnen geschahen und ob diese 
Fälle in ihrer Lebenszeit und oder in der Lebenszeit ihrer Eltern 
geschahen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Beaucoup d'événements historiques importants se 
produisent autour du monde dans la vie d'une personne. Les 
étudiants seront invités à identifier les événements historiques 
d'année se sont produits et si ces événements se sont produits dans
leur vie et ou dans la vie de leurs parents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Muitos eventos históricos importantes acontecem em torno 
do mundo na vida de uma pessoa. Os learners serão pedidos para 
identificar os eventos históricos do ano aconteceram e se estes 
eventos aconteceram em sua vida e ou na vida dos seus pais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molti eventi storici importanti accadono intorno al mondo 
nel corso della vita della persona. I principianti saranno 
chiesti di identificare gli eventi storici di anno sono accaduto e se 
questi eventi sono accaduto nel loro corso della vita ed o nel corso 
della vita dei loro genitori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλά σημαντικά ιστορικά γεγονότα συμβαίνουν σε όλο 
τον κόσμο στη διάρκεια ζωής ενός προσώπου. Οι αρχάριοι θα 
κληθούν να προσδιορίσουν τα ιστορικά γεγονότα έτους συνέβησαν 
και εάν αυτά τα γεγονότα συνέβησαν στη διάρκεια ζωής τους και ή
στη διάρκεια ζωής των γονέων τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Muchos acontecimientos históricos importantes suceden 
alrededor del mundo en el curso de la vida de una persona. 
Pedirán los principiantes identificar los acontecimientos 
históricos del año sucedieron y si estos acontecimientos sucedieron 
en su curso de la vida y o en el curso de la vida de sus padres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">historische Fälle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebenszeit der Eltern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité interactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">événements historiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la vie des parents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eventos históricos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">corso della vita dei genitori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">curso de la vida de los padres</string>
